item.title: TryHackMe Pre-Security Learning Path Review
item.content:
The TryHackMe Pre-Security learning path is the newest of the learning paths and acts as a way for anyone brand new to IT and cyber security to learn the basics of the field. This includes getting their hands dirty and the minds ticking with some introductory networking, linux and windows fundamentals.

This is some sample C++ code for the classic Hello World program:

#include <iostream>

int main(void) 
{
    std::cout << "Hello World" << std::endl;
    return 0;
}
